trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated users (Universal Windows 8.1) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated users (Universal Windows 8.1) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to a specific authenticated user running your Universal Windows 8.1 app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure Mobile Services to send push notifications to a specific authenticated user running your Universal Windows 8.1 app.

trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated users
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated users

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticate user on any registered device.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticate user on any registered device.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the previous [push notification][Get started with push notifications] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Unlike the previous [push notification][Get started with push notifications] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.
trans-unit.target: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the server code is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.
trans-unit.target: Finally, the server code is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial supports both Windows Store and Windows Phone Store apps.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial supports both Windows Store and Windows Phone Store apps.

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:

trans-unit.source: Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target: Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source: Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Update the service to require authentication to register
trans-unit.target: Update the service to require authentication to register

trans-unit.source: Update the app to log in before registration
trans-unit.target: Update the app to log in before registration
